name: NETGEAR Orbi 970 WiFi 7 Mesh
description: Premium WiFi 7 mesh with 27Gbps combined speeds. Features 10G WAN/LAN, dedicated wireless backhaul, and coverage up to 10,000 sq ft. The flagship mesh system.

reviews.review_text: WiFi 7 mesh done right. Incredible speeds.
Expensive but covers massive home perfectly.
